ingredients.ingredient: 2 (6 ounce) cans crabmeat, drained and flaked
1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained and roughly chopped
1 (8 ounce) package light cream cheese, cubed

cookingTips: Spread pizza dough onto prepared baking sheets; let rest 5 minutes before adding toppings
Distribute crab and pineapple evenly to ensure balanced bites in every slice
Cube cream cheese and distribute it before baking so it melts and creates a creamy base
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the sweetness of pineapple with savory crab and cheese components?
